about_the_game:
Dive into Simuverse Interactive's new public transport simulation!

Explore the three most picturesque underground lines in Germany! The Berlin U1/U3 and the Hamburg U3 are waiting for you. 

Immerse yourself in everyday life in the two German metropolises and discover famous sights such as Hamburg's harbour or Berlin's Oberbaum Bridge. 

Master various scenarios and get your passengers to their destination safely and on time. Watch out, though, as disruptions and red signals can suddenly change your workload!

Are you ready to start your first shift?

Experience public transport on a new level. SubwaySim 2 offers an unparalleled standard of realism and authenticity. The graphics have been improved even more since the predecessor, and particular attention was dedicated to the vehicles, which are more detailled than ever before.

Authentic scenarios, dynamic weather and the brand-new career mode round off the realistic picture of a subway operator's day-to-day work.

Discover the underground network of the German capital Berlin!

Transport your passengers on two lines of the Berlin underground network, with a total length of 30 kilometres and 26 highly detailed, unique stations.

Along the route, you will encounter the iconic sights of Germany’s largest city. Thanks to the detailed recreation of routes and surroundings, as well as the Unreal Engine 5, virtual Berlin looks more detailed than ever before!

Take control of two fully functional and highly detailed vehicles and the discover the lovingly designed above-ground sections of the track in the middle of the city centre. The vehicles include the A3L vehicle, a true Berlin icon, in the A3L92 edition, as well as the HK electric multiple unit.

Just as with the stations, particular attention has been paid to every detail of the vehicles.

Start your journey along Hamburg's U3 line and make sure that your passengers get from station to station safely!

20.7 kilometres and 25 accurately recreated stations are waiting for you to be discovered. From the Elbphilharmonie, the Landungsbrücken to the Elbpromenade, many iconic sights of the Hanseatic city along the U3 have been recreated and offer an authentic picture of Hamburg.

Thanks to Unreal Engine 5, the DT5, available in two versions, was recreated with all the smallest details. The accurate driving experience, accompanied by the accurate sounds, gives you an authentic insight into the everyday life of a Hamburg subway operator.

Features - SubwaySim 2

  • A total of 3 underground railway lines in Hamburg and Berlin

  • 41 km of lovingly recreated track, mostly above ground

  • 51 detailed stations with interactive passengers

  • Impressive sights along the route

  • 3 playable, highly detailed vehicles (type DT5, HK and A3L92) with an authentic soundscape

  • Functional depots and stabling halls

  • Challenging scenarios with dynamic weather

  • Lively environment with passengers, AI trains and AI cars

  • Career mode with realistic transport issues, such as delays, red lights and breakdowns

  • Impressive graphics thanks to Unreal Engine 5

name: SubwaySim 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, 10 or 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or dedicated soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: from 3.6 GHz, 8 cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 TI or AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT, each with 12 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or dedicated soundcard

short_description: Explore the three most picturesque underground lines in Germany! The Berlin U1/U3 and the Hamburg U3 are waiting for you.  Immerse yourself in everyday life in the two German metropolises and discover famous sights such as Hamburg's harbour or Berlin's Oberbaum Bridge.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
